# Shadow Clone (Ninja Trick)
## Overview
*Shadow Clone (Su):* The ninja can create 1d4 shadowy duplicates of herself that conceal her true location. This ability functions as *[[Mirror Image (Spell)|mirror image]]*, using the ninjaâ€™s level as her caster level. Using this ability is a standard action that uses up 1 ki point.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 15
